headline: Adobe And Cognizant Target Enterprise AI Content Workflows And Investor Concerns
summary: Adobe and Cognizant expanded their collaboration to help large enterprises adopt generative AI for content creation and customer experience. The partnership focuses on embedding AI into creative workflows while supporting governance, compliance, and efficiency needs. The effort targets regulated and high growth industries that are facing fast rising content and personalization demands. Adobe, ticker NasdaqGS:ADBE, is leaning into generative AI at a time when its share price sits at $293.25...

headline: What CFOs at Adobe, Dataminr, and Huntington say about scaling AI
summary: From pilots to production, finance chiefs are reshaping AI strategy around data, governance, and speed.
